bill.title: Relating To Increasing The Payment Amount For The Office Of Hawaiian Affairs' Pro Rata Share Of The Public Land Trust.
bill.description: Establishes the annual share of income and proceeds from the public land trust for fiscal year 2022-2023 due to the Office of Hawaiian Affairs. Establishes and appropriates amounts to the Office of Hawaiian Affairs. Establishes a working group to determine pro rata share of income and proceeds from the public land trust due annually to Office of Hawaiian Affairs. (CD1)

history.action: Pending Introduction.
Introduced and passed First Reading.
Referred to HWN, WAM.
The committee(s) on HWN has scheduled a public hearing on 01-25-22 1:00PM; Via Videoconference.

The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HWN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Keohokalole, Acasio, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
Reported from HWN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2046) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-22-22 10:00AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 02-23-22 10:10AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Misalucha, Moriwaki, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi, Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3014) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-22.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Fevella). Transmitted to House.

Pass First Reading

The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, LoPresti, Lowen, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Tokioka, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) D. Kobayashi.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1339-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Branco, Holt voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ohno excused (1).

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Lowen excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
